Pre-Game Insights: India has a strong historical record against Pakistan in T20 World Cups, with 12 wins in 12 matches.
Pakistan has a 10-match winning streak in the UAE, their home venue for the past decade.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is expected to break viewing records, with over 273 million viewers in 2019.
Tickets sold out within hours, with a 70% capacity limit due to Covid-19 restrictions.
Others: The match is the first between the two teams since the 2019 World Cup, with India and Pakistan competing in Group 2 of the Super 12 stage.
